text:
Good morning!
Is there a way to add the email from the person that submitted the form to the redirect url?
essentially, I want the thank-you page to be something like <http://www.samplepage.com/thank-you?email={{contact.email}}|www.samplepage.com/thank-you?email={{contact.email}}>
I’ve been struggling with this for some time now and cant find a solution.
I tried some javascript way and it works in normal windows but in incognito it wont…
Putting any PII (personally identifiable information) in urls is not a great idea, there are a lot of articles online explaining why.
